From the brand

Christmas Decorations

Christmas Decorations string lights

Christmas Decorations

„ÄêSafe and Easy to Use„ÄëLED Waterfall Lights output voltage is 29V with UL Certified to ensure safety use. and this outdoor christmas decorations clearance is safe to touch and will keep at a low-temperature state after lighting up for hours. It’s very safe, power-saving, and environmentally friendly.
„Äê8 Lights Modes & IP44 Waterproof„ÄëThe fairy lights have 8 different light patterns: Combination, In Wave, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chasing/Flash, Slow fade, Twinkle/Flash, Steady on. IP44 waterproof is perfect for outdoor use without any damage, including heavy rain and snow.
„ÄêIdeal Gift & Decoration Choice„Äë This christmas decorations outdoor yard lights can be hung on eaves, porches and trees. Widely use to hanging Christmas tree outdoor, Yards, porches, patio, garden, wall, window, bedroom, living room, wedding, party, birthday, Christmas etc.
„ÄêTimer Function & Friendly Service„ÄëBuilt-in timer function, Press the timer button and the indicator light on the controller will light up, which means the lights will automatically light up for 6 hours and turn off for 18 hours. We support 12 month free replacement and provide 24-hour online customer service, please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any question.

Easy to Use

The christmas tree decorations lights have two control ways, which is the mode button of the plug and the remote control. You can adjust the brightness from 100%, 75%, 50%, 25%. According to your actual needs choose the comfortable brightness. It can create a romatic atmosphere for your life.

Low Voltage & UL Certification

This Christmas lights use 29V safety low voltage , which strictly tested and meets the US requirements of string lights UL safety standards, More safety and less power consumption. No danger of electric shock, lower than standard body safe voltage 36V.

Outdoor Waterproof Designed

The high waterproof rating and strong construction is durable enough to stand complex climates, ideal for home decor, holiday outdoor decorations, garden decor for outside, new year decorations and can work normally even in cold winter.

item.title: Fairy Gardens,Fairy a Garden Set with Planting Tools,Fairy House Kit for 5,6,7,8,9,10,11,12 Year Old Boys and Girls to Play and Plant,Suitable for Children as Birthday Gifts
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) üå±„ÄêCreate Your Own Magic Cottage„Äë:This fairy house set lets your little one grow plants using the included soil,gardening tools.Observe the whole process of plants from sowing,germination,flowering,and fruiting,experience the fun of planting,and feel the tenacity of life in nature.You can also add your favorite plants or flowers to create your own ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:09:50 UTC – Details)



„ÄêCreate Your Own Magic Cottage„Äë:This fairy house set lets your little one grow plants using the included soil,gardening tools.Observe the whole process of plants from sowing,germination,flowering,and fruiting,experience the fun of planting,and feel the tenacity of life in nature.You can also add your favorite plants or flowers to create your own magic gardens for even more fun.
„ÄêA kids Garden Suitable for Cultivating STEM„Äë:This flower garden toy allows your child to experience the full process of plant growth: planting,growing,flowering,fruiting.In the process, children can take a closer look at their own small garden, connect with nature through the garden set, and learn about botany and the life cycle of plants.Planting a fairy gardens is a great activity that develops planting skills, responsibility and confidence.
„ÄêFairy Gardens Craft Kit„Äë:The fairy house kit includes a shovel, water can, garden toy rake, pink flower pot, mushroom house, fairy tale house,table and chairs,2 soils,and instructions for the children’s plant growth kit.With these garden tools,kids can grow their own fairy house and even decorate with some pebbles,garden toys or other fun things to play in the magical fairy world you create!
„ÄêStart Growing Your Magic Cottage Magical Cottage„Äë: Install the main body of the fairy hut following the instructions included,soak the soil in water,pour it over the upper and lower parts of the pot,place the plant in the soil with a tool.Water the plant as needed and make sure it also gets sunlight.You can play your magical gardening play set indoors or out!Watch your garden every day to see the plant sprout and grow,as well as plant your favorite flowers.
„ÄêUnique Gifts for Kids„Äë:Magic kids garden kits for girls and boys ages 3 and up are unique gifts for little ones on birthdays,Christmas, Thanksgiving and more.Children will have fun looking after their magic garden.This toy is suitable for children over 3 years old.For safety reasons,it is recommended that parents accompany children to play together.If you have any questions about toy flower garden,please feel free to contact us.We will get back to you within 24 hours.

Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:09:50 UTC – Details)

Forblader Super long 403ft 1000 LED Christmas lights to brighten up your Christmas tree, porch, yard, garden, patios, bushes, fences, bedroom railings, Christmas, holidays, weddings, valentine‚Äôs Day, New Year, Thanksgiving, parties houses, exterior, and indoors. etc.

Features:

No Need To extend! One Set Is Enough!

‚ÄîSuper Bright, Look Bright But Not Dazzling!

‚Äî8 Lighting Modes: (1. Combination, 2. In waves, 3. Sequential, 4. Slo-Glo, 5. Chasing/flash, 6. Slow fade, 7. Twinkle/flash, 8. Steady on). From Steady on to blinking, you would find your love!

‚Äî 4 Brightness Levels, Press DIM+/Dim- via the remote controller to adjust brightness level ( 100% 75% 50% 25%).

‚ÄîTimer Function,6H on, 18H off automatically, conveniently, energy-saving, and environmentally friendly. Through the timer setting, it would light up on time every day. 

‚ÄîMemory Function, Built-in memory chip, will save your last lighting modes, no need to reset every day.

‚ÄîSafe to Touch,Come with UL588 certified & a 29V low voltage power plug. Safer and has Less power consumption.

‚ÄîIP44 Waterproof perfect for outdoor use without any damage, including heavy rain and snow.

Specifications:

Material:Copper + Plastic

Total Length: 403ft

LED light Length: 394ft/1000LED

Lead Length: 9.84ft

Color: 5600K Warm White

Waterproof Grade: IP44

Output: 29V Low Voltage

Maximum Remote Control Distance: 8m (26ft)

Package Includes:

1 x 1000 LED Xmas String Lights

1 x Remote Control

1 x Plug

1 x User Manual
„ÄêWarm White Color Changing & 8 Lighting Modes and Remote Control„ÄëIncluding (1.Combination, 2.In waves, 3.Sequential, 4.Slo-glo,5.Chasing/flash, 6.Slow fade, 7.Twinkle/flash, 8.Steady on). Both the remote control and the controller can switch modes, easy to control. „ÄêIP44 WATERPROOF OUTDOORS„ÄëPerfect for outdoor using without any damage, including heavy rain and snow. Tips: Please note that the US-Plug is NOT waterproof, please keep it away from water.
„Äê4 Brightness Levels & Timer Setting & Memory Function„ÄëOur Christmas Lights have 100%-75%-50%-25% 4 level brightness to create suitable and comfortable atmospheres for various occasions.Timer function will automatically turn on and off to help you control time( 6Hrs on, 18Hrs off). Choose a timer mode not only energy saving, but also save electricity bills. A built-in memory chip of Christmas lights indoor & outdoor will save your last time setting,no need to reset everyday.
„ÄêSafety UL Certified Plug & Easy To Shape„ÄëUL588 certified and 12V low-voltage and 29V DC Output makes the Christmas string lights more safe and reliable for chridren and pet, and Made by high-quality copper wire,These outdoor string lights won’t cause overheating, won’t be hot-to-the-touch during extended usage, and they consume less energy, making them the top environmental and money saving choice of Lights!
„ÄêWhat You Get & Quality Assurance„Äë1 x 1000 LED SUPER long string light, 1x Remote Control(include battery), 1 x User Manual and our professional & kind service include a 1-year replacement. If the product has manufacturing defects, please don‚Äôt hesitate to contact us, We will do our best to help you to solve it.

Super long 1000 LED Christmas String Lights

We wish you can have a colorful holidays

8 Lighting Modes and Remote Control

Christmas string lights come with 8 modes, including combination, in waves,slo-glo,chasing/fade, slow fade,twinkling/flash,sequential, in wave modes.From Steady on to blinking, you would find your love!

Safe to Touch & IP44 Waterproof

Stay cool, you can use and touch them outdoors or indoors safely. Come with a 29V low voltage power plug. More safe and Less power consumption.IP44 waterproof and designed to withstand bad weather.

Timer & Memory Function

Timer function will automatically turn on and off to help you control time( 6Hrs on, 18Hrs off). Choose a timer mode not only energy saving, but also save electricity bills. Built in memory chip, will save your last lighting modes, no need to reset everyday.

4 Brightness Levels

Press DIM+/Dim- via remote controller to adjust brightness level (100%-75%-50%-25%) to create suitable and comfortable atmospheres for various occasions.Super Bright, Look Bright But Not Dazzling!

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

From the brand

Merry and Bright

Swipe left to learn more

Committed to creating a comfortable, cozy and festival ambiance for your outdoor & indoor space and life.

We are continually enhancing our product lines to bring you the newest technologies and features available in the marketplace.

We pays attention to not only colorful lighting but also your safety.

Enjoy Decorating Your Home

STRING LIGHTS

WINDOW LIGHTS

ICECICLE LIGHTS

HALLOWEEN LIGHTS

„ÄêMore Comprehensive Functions„Äë8 Lighting Modes Timer Memory8 options lighting modes make a playful addition to Christmas decor. Build in timer and memory, lights will auto on/off once set, don’t need to operate it manually. Saves your last lighting choice, which is more user friendly!
„ÄêSafer and Energy Efficient„ÄëHigh Efficient LED lights will save you money on energy costs, they‚Äôll last longer than incandescent lights and you don‚Äôt have to worry about them overheating. Features upgraded 29V low voltage ETL adapter allowing end-to-end linkable up to 2 sets, max 1222 LED 132ft, so you can extend to decorate a greater area easily.
„ÄêSuperior Weather Resistance„ÄëOur led lights use high-quality PVC wire and built with IP44 Weatherproof-Tech so that they can withstand all weather for year-round enjoyment. Please note that the adapter is NOT waterproof, please kindly protect the power adapter from the water!
„ÄêPopular Choice & Widely Used„ÄëSuitable for both outdoor & indoor Christmas decorations. Suitable for both outdoor & indoor Christmas decorations. White Christmas lights lend a timeless look, and they will give your home a whimsical, snow-covered appearance. More safer to kids and your family while Christmas party, family reunion, wedding party and BBQ outside.



Features

  • High Brightness: Features shatter-resistant acrylic LED bulbs with a concave lens, for a brilliant burst of light that looks great even from a distance.
  • Much Safer: The working voltage for the LED string light is only 29V, which emits extremely low heat. And the circuit board of adapter with short circuit protection puts your safety first. (All passed the UL588 test.)
  • Economic: Only 6 watts per set, saving money on your energy bills while you enjoy the beauty of brilliant Christmas lights.
  • Built to Last: The LEDs are wrapped with milky white sleeve and hot melt adhesive, that seal out moisture for longer life, and a lifespan up to 50000 hours.

These fantastic ice lights perfectly complement other outdoor decorations like Christmas window lights and help to transform your garden (usually at the front) into a festive grotto, especially when teamed with decorations like Outdoor Christmas decorations.

Product Parameters

Light Color: Cool White
Wire color: Clear wire
Number of leds: 611 LED
Number of drop wire: 141 drops
Light Length: 66ft (20m)
Power lead length: 11.5ft (3.5m)

5.5-in spacing between drops, and staggered drop lengths of 23.6 in, 15.7 in and 11.8 in, provide the virtual icy look for your home.


WIDELY USED–The Christmas lights are easy to install on overhangs, awnings, roof edges, windows and other places on your home’s exterior or interior.

Dense evergreen trees, like pines, firs and spruces, may require more lights. By wrapping bushes and shrubs with this ice string lights, you‚Äôll cover a greater area with fewer strands and less work.


Read more




UL LISTED AND QUALITY INSPECTION

Clear wire with 29V UL listed power adapter led string lights create a safe and secure holiday for you and your loved one.

WITH MEMORY FUNCTION

Built-in memory chip, Saves your last lighting mode without you having to remember to reset so every night, which is more user friendly!

END TO END CONNECTABLE

Features upgraded adapter led string lights allowing end-to-end linkable up to 2 sets, 66ft 611 LED per strand, max 1222 LED 132ft. So you can easily light a greater area.

Read more


It is suitable for decoration in many scenes, but also suitable as a gift for our family, friends, classmate, lovers and so on.

From the brand

Lighting has been deeply rooted in the soul of human . In the unity of function and formÔºålamps not only become masters of creating atmosphere, but also add artistic tone to the space.

EXF has always been endeavoring in the combination of bright and art.

‚ÄúEXTRA FUN AND BEAUTY for your home decoration‚Äù is our design concept and goal. We hope your life will be accompanied by us all the time.

C9 Christmas lights

Solar string lights

Meteor shower lights

Christmas String Lights

„ÄêWidely Used Solar Lights Outdoor„Äë: This starbright solar LED string lights is a great choice for Christmas, Wedding, Patio, Garden, Yard, Party, Fence, Porch, Xmas Tree, Roof and so on.
„ÄêEnergy-Saving & High Efficiency„Äë: This outdoor string lights charging by solar energy, have no extra utility of electric cost, and no need to replace the battery. It can work up to 8~10 hours at night after fully charged under sunshine for 6~8 hours.
„Äê8 Modes & Memory Function„Äë: These solar mini lights have the ON/OFF button and mode button. You can select 8 different modes to satisfy your diverse needs by pressing the mode button. And the built-in memory chip saves your last modes setting, so there is no need to reset it.
*NOTES*: 1. Please power ON first before charging, and it will be charged and light on automatically. 2. Be sure the solar panel is in a sunny location ‚Äì not in a shady area ‚Äì and the solar panel faces the sun. 3. If any question about order or product, please contact seller and we will respond in 24 hours.

Read more

EXF warm white solar Christmas lights are perfect for your celebrations outdoors or around your front yard, bring warmth to your home!

An Ideal decor for our outdoor living

With 2022 upgraded solar panel, the outdoor string lights will provide you a better experience of outdoor living. It is an ideal decor for the Christmas trees and fence and more.

Energy Saving & IP65 Waterproof

The solar LED string lights are powered by solar energy, this light will lights up automatically at night and off during the day, no utility energy costs. With its IP65 water resistance performance, it can work as usual even in rainy days when there is still power with the battery, no need to worry about short circuit due to moisture.

8 Lighting Modes & Memory Function

Our solar Christmas lights outdoor waterproof have memory function and it will remember the last light setting mode and no need to press the ON/OFF button every day. You can press the button on the solar panel to select any lighting mode you like.

Read more

8 Brilliant Lighting Modes:

  • Combination
  • Waves
  • Sequential
  • Slow glow
  • Chasing/flash
  • Slow fade
  • Twinkle/flash
  • Steady-on

Specifications:

  • LED Color: Warm White
  • LED quantity: 100 LED * 4 = 400 LEDs
  • Switch: ON/OFF, MODE (8 Modes)
  • Charging time: 6-8 hours & Working time: 8 -10 hours
  • String light Length: 33ft * 4 =132ft
  • Wire Length to first LED: 1.5m/4.9ft
  • Space Between LEDs: 10cm/0.32ft
  • Battery: 800MAH Ni-MH rechargeable battery

Read more

HOW to use it?

  • Assemble the lights according to the IM;
  • Remove the protective clear film on the solar panel;
  • Cover the solar panel entirely and press the ON/OFF button, ensure it is at ON mode, then press MODE button to select your favorite lighting mode;
  • Find a place you would like to decorate, make sure the solar panel can be exposed to efficient direct sunshine, meanwhile, this place will not have bright light source at night;
  • Softten the earth with water and insert the ground spike into the earth;
  • Adjust the solar panel and make it face upwardly, tighten the screw, it will turn on at night and turn off at dawn automatically.

WHY it doesn’t work?

  • Please place the solar panel under direct sunshine to charge for one or 2 days and it should be able to turn on as usual.
  • Check the solar panel is ON, cover the complete solar panel. If the lights come on, the button is in the on position.
  • If the sun is not enough weather, or the temperature of the cold season, please charge more than a few days.

Any questions please feel freely to ask us, we will help you solve problem quickly.

4.5

From the brand

Light Up Your Life

Hot Sale Icicle Lights

Popular String Lights

Classic Christmas Mini Lights

CLuster Lights Christmas Tree

Christmas Icicle Lights

„Äê Energy Saving & Safe to Use„ÄëThese UL588-listed icicle outdoor lights come with a 29V low voltage plug, offer up to 90% in energy savings than traditional incandescent lights and ensure the max safety. This means children, and pets are safe to touch the hanging Christmas lights. More safety and less power consumption.
„Äê8 Modes with Remote & Memory „ÄëOur LED icicle string lights offer 8 different lighting modes for you to choose from (Steady on, In Wave, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chasing Flash, Fade, Twinkling Flash, and Combination). And thanks to the built-in memory chip, our fairy icicle lights will save your last time lights setting.
„Äê4 Brightness levels & 3 Timer Function„Äë4 Brightness level: 100%-75%-50%-25%; 3 Timer Function: 6H on, 18H off/ 8H on, 16H off/ 6H on, 6H off, 3H on, 9H off. You can adjust Christmas lights for the house by remote easily, and choose one favorite mode to enhance the Christmas spirit.
„ÄêIP44 Waterproof „ÄëThe Waterproof Christmas string lights are designed to withstand light rain or water spills, making them perfect for both indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations even on rainy or snowy days, like eave, patio, stair, gazebo, fence, trees, roof awnings, or even hung on the wall of your bedroom.

Ollny Christmas Icicle Lights Decorate Your Life!

You can adjust modes/dimmable/times by remote easily. Choose one favorite mode to create your lively Christmas atmosphere. Connected led Christmas lights can be controlled by one remote. For 720LED 60FT long Icicle Lights, we recommend connecting only 2 sets to ensure the lighting effect.

Package included

1x 720LED Multicolor Icicle Lights

1x Remote

1x UL Plug

1x Controller

1x Manual

Specification

LED Qty: 720LED, total 120 drops

Light Length: 60ft

Lead Cable: 16.4ft

Wire Color: Clear White

Material: Copper+Plastic

Connectable: Max of 3 Set

Rated Voltage: 29V Safe Plug In

Read more

IP44 Waterproof

Effectively block rainwater from entering. Make Christmas string lights not only be used indoors but also outdoor usage even on rainy, snowy, or storm days.

Safe to Touch

Stay cool, you can use and touch them outdoors or indoors safely. Come with a 29V low voltage power plug. More safe and Less power consumption.

Memory Function

A built-in memory chip will save your last mode settings. There is no need to reset the mode each day.

Read more

Installation

These icicle lights were neatly packed, which makes it easy to unpack them without creating a tangle. Please kindly hang the main string of lights first, then unwrap the individual strings to avoid tangling.
